modShortDescription: This 7 Days to Die HUD mod adds additional information to your toolbelt: XP to next level, player temperature, map temperature, map elevation and more.
modDescription:
This 7 Days to Die [HUD mod](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-hud-mod/) adds additional information to your [toolbelt](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-toolbelt/):

* XP bar with current level and XP to next level
* Player temperature
* Map temperature
* Map elevation
* Player zombie kills
* Player deaths
* Player PvP kills

**[Download](https://docs.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1gSIx8XrqX2c0hLuDjejhLldHBz_elwOF)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/15828-hud-toolbelt-with-xp-to-next-level-temperature-mapelevation-kills-and-deaths/).

**Credits:** HaeuptlingZauberfuss
